name: Aeda Ability: Summon Infernal
description:
Aeda Brightdawn will learn the ability Summon Infernal.

 Summon Infernal
Summons a Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 3,294 Fire damage and stunning all enemy targets in the area for 2 sec.  The Infernal will serve under your command for 30 sec.
